timeline.bodyText: I'm torn on this one. I can see a temporary "FAILED" output being useful, but it's still kind of "RUNNING" since it'll get picked up again unless something breaks internally.
timeline.author: Ceiu

replies.bodyText: I haven't thought of that. It makes sense to map it to failed only once it reaches terminal state. Done.
replies.author: Januson

timeline.bodyText: Should QUEUED be part of RUNNING or CREATED? This is another one where I can see arguments for either case.
timeline.author: Ceiu

replies.bodyText: I guess you are right. Queued job is not running yet so we can merge the state into the CREATED instead of RUNNING. Done.
replies.author: Januson
